lookup.use: Check if a system exists in EDSM

locate.use: Check if a CMDR exists and shares their location in EDSM

distance.use: Check the distance between two points in EDSM

landmark.use: Check if a given point is nearby a given Landmark System

dssa.use: Check for the closest DSSA carrier to a given location.

mancase.use: Used to start a new Manual Seal Case by Dispatchers. Drillled Seals Only, and run in a channel.

manfish.use: Used to start a new Manual Kingfisher Case by Dispatchers. Drillled Seals Only, and run in a channel.

tsping.use: Used to ping the Trained Seal role in the Seal discord. Drillled Seals Only,  and run in a channel.

ping.use: Check to see if the bot is responding to commands.

utc.use: Check for the current In Game Time and Date

year.use: Check for the current In Game Year

whois.use: Check the user information for registered name. Must be a registered user, and run in DMs with HalpyBOT.

whoami.use: Check the user information on yourself. Must be a registered user, and run in DMs with HalpyBOT.

forcejoin.use: Force a user to join an allowed channel in IRC. Drilled Seals Only, must be run in a channel.

bacon.use: A fun little link - who doesn't love Bacon!

beacon.use: How to turn on a Wing Beacon

cbinfo.use: To gather Code Black information from a manual case.

cbmining.use: Information about how mining works for clients in Code Black cases.

chatter.use: If Repair Requests has too much side conversation happening, to redirect Seals to better places.

clientinbob.use: For use when a Case is in the Seal Bob, and the channel must shift to a rescue focus.

clientinfo.use: To gather case information from a manual case.

cmdlist.use: Page in the knowledge base listing commands

escapeneutron.use: Information and guides on how to escape a Neutron Cone

fuel.use: Redirect a Client to the Fuel Rats

help.use: Links to resouces should a CMDR need help

highg.use: Prepare a Client to take off from a High G planet.

join.use: Provide a user information on how to join the Hull Seals

kfbeacon.use: Request a Client turn on their Wing Beacon from their SRV

paperwork.use: Send a Seal their paperwork link.

pcfr.use: Request a Client add their Seals to their Friends List.

prep.use: Get a Client ready for their Seal's arrival.

psfr.use: Request a Client add their Seals to their Friends List.

rebootrepair.use: Provide instructions on what a reboot and repair cycle is, and what it does

securechannel.use: For when important Case info is being discussed in the Seal Bob, and other topics should wait until the case is over.

stuck.use: To gather Kingfisher information from a manual case.

synth.use: Instructions on how to synth a new life support refill

tos.use: A quicklink to our TOS. If this is used, a hammer is likely to follow.

verify.use: Request a suspect Client provide an image or other information to help validate their repair request. If used, immediately inform a staff member.

welcome.use: Welcome a Client and get them ready for a Dispatcher's arrival

wing.use: Request a Client add their Seals to their wing.

xbfr.use: Request a Client add their Seals to their Friends List.

delaystatus.use: Checks the system for Delayed Cases

delaycase.use: Adds a new case to the Delayed system, and responds with a unique Case ID.

updatestatus.use: Updates the Status Code of a case - see the table of different status codes below!

updatenotes.use: Updates the Notes attached to a case - this replaces the old notes entirely, so be sure to be complete in your new notes!

updatecase.use: Updates both the Status Code and Notes of a case - this replaces the old notes entirely, so be sure to be complete in your new notes!

close.use: Closes a case and removes it from the Delayed Case system. It's encouraged to update the notes before you close a case!

reopen.use: Reopens a previously-closed case, if a case is improperly closed. Moderator only
